title: Healing Prevented(Post Game Stats)
body:
whats the chances we could get healing prevented as a post game stat
IE from morello mortal reminder ignite etc
I think it would help a lot in the decision making of when to buy these items

I do understand that against some champions they are essential(vlad,darius, aatrox etc to name a few)
but having the stat would show whether it beats out other options when only one of these champs is present or if only the adc has lifesteal etc

replies.body:
The item themselves should maybe show how much they have helped prevent when you hover over them rather then end of game.
Kind of like how Locket tells you how much shielding you've provided.

I like having item specific stats a lot (wish you could view em in post game too) so I like this idea! I love having interesting stats like that, even if they aren't always directly helpful they're just fun :)
